media.headline: Santana's leadoff home run
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Santana cranks a homer to lead off the game
media.bigblurb: Carlos Santana homers on a fly ball to right-center field to lead off the game, giving the Indians an early 1-0 lead

media.headline: Chirinos throws out Lindor
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Chirinos nabs Lindor after call overturned
media.bigblurb: Robinson Chirinos makes a quick throw to Elvis Andrus at second, and Francisco Lindor is ruled out after the Rangers challenge in the 1st

media.headline: Guyer's diving catch
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Guyer dives to make grab to rob Gomez
media.bigblurb: Brandon Guyer lays out for a line drive off the bat of Carlos Gomez and makes a fine catch for the first out in the bottom of the 1st

media.headline: Gallo's two-run homer
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Gallo's two-run homer puts Rangers on board
media.bigblurb: Joey Gallo hits a two-run home run to right field, putting the Rangers on the board in the bottom of the 2nd

media.headline: Carrasco strikes out Choo
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Carrasco K's Choo in the bottom of the 1st
media.bigblurb: Carlos Carrasco strikes out Shin-Soo Choo for the second out in the bottom of the 1st

media.headline: Jackson's RBI single
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Jackson smacks single to drive in Guyer
media.bigblurb: Austin Jackson hits a grounder back up the middle for an RBI single to give the Indians a 2-0 lead in the top of the 2nd

media.headline: Santana's RBI single
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Santana hits an RBI single to extend lead
media.bigblurb: Carlos Santana singles on a grounder to center field, scoring Yan Gomes and extending the Indians' lead 3-0 in the top of the 2nd

media.headline: Andrus starts fantastic DP
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Andrus dives, flips with glove to start DP
media.bigblurb: Elvis Andrus lays out to his left to field a grounder, then flips with his glove to second to start an excellent 6-4-3 double play

media.headline: Diaz catches liner
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Diaz snags a line drive up to his left
media.bigblurb: Yandy Diaz makes the catch on a sharply hit liner off the bat of Mike Napoli in the bottom of the 2nd

media.headline: Carrasco strikes out Odor
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Carrasco strikes out Odor on a full count
media.bigblurb: Carlos Carrasco strikes out Rougned Odor swinging on a full count to end the bottom of the 3rd

media.headline: Guyer cuts down Mazara
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Guyer nabs Mazara trying to stretch single
media.bigblurb: Brandon Guyer fields Nomar Mazara's single to right field, then throws him out at second as he tries to stretch it into a double

media.headline: Brantley's RBI single
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Brantley hits RBI single to extend lead
media.bigblurb: Michael Brantley singles on a ground ball to left-center, bringing home Austin Jackson and extending the Indians' lead to 4-2 in the 7th

media.headline: Ramirez's running catch
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Ramirez puts on the jets to make catch
media.bigblurb: Jose Ramirez straps on the wheels to make the catch in right field on a pop fly from Carlos Gomez in the bottom of the 8th

media.headline: Gomes' fly ball goes foul
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Gomes drives foul ball, call confirmed
media.bigblurb: Yan Gomes knocks a deep fly ball down the left-field line, and after the umpires review to see if it is a home run, the call is confirmed

media.headline: Napoli's RBI double
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Napoli hits an RBI double in bottom of 9th
media.bigblurb: Mike Napoli hits an RBI double to left field, bringing the Rangers within one in the bottom of the 9th

media.headline: Allen fans side to earn save
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Allen fans side to earn save in 9th
media.bigblurb: With the tying run on second base, Cody Allen strikes out three Rangers to earn the win in the Indians 4-3 victory

media.headline: Rua throws out Ramirez at third
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Rua throws to Andrus to get Ramirez at third
media.bigblurb: Ryan Rua fires to Elvis Andrus to get Jose Ramirez trying to advance to third base in the top of the 6th inning

media.headline: Napoli's catch on line drive
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Napoli makes the catch on a line drive
media.bigblurb: Mike Napoli makes the catch on a line drive off the bat of Austin Jackson for the final out in the top of the 4th inning

media.headline: Carrasco strikes out seven
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Carrasco strikes out seven over 5 2/3 frames
media.bigblurb: Carlos Carrasco strikes out seven in 5 2/3 innings of two-run ball, allowing four hits and one walk in his first outing of 2017

media.headline: Must C: Gallo's mammoth homer
media.blurb: Must C Crushed: Gallo belts colossal home run
media.bigblurb: Joey Gallo obliterates a two-run home run to the upper deck in right field at Globe Life Park

media.headline: Banister on loss to Indians
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Banister talks about the Rangers' loss
media.bigblurb: Rangers manager Jeff Banister talks about Martin Perez's inability to settle down in the team's loss to the Indians

media.headline: Recap: CLE 4, TEX 3
media.blurb: 4/4/17: Carrasco leads Indians to second win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Carlos Santana belted a leadoff home run and drove in two runs, while Carlos Carrasco struck out seven over 5 2/3 frames

media.headline: Statcast: Gallo's 443-ft homer
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Gallo's 443-ft homer reaches second deck
media.bigblurb: Statcast breaks down the exit velocity, launch angle, projected hang time and distance of Joey Gallo's home run into the second deck

media.headline: Francona on win over Rangers
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Francona praises pitching in win
media.bigblurb: Indians manager Terry Francona talks about Carlos Carrasco and Cody Allen's big performances in a win over the Rangers

media.headline: 4/4/17 CG: CLE@TEX
media.blurb: 4/4/17 Condensed Game: CLE@TEX
media.bigblurb: 4/4/17 Condensed Game: CLE@TEX

media.headline: Banister on Perez settling down
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Banister discusses Perez's outing
media.bigblurb: Jeff Banister discusses Martin Perez early struggles vs the Indians, settling down later in the game
